Related Issues: _No response_

Title: Create Pavlovian Conditioning Behavior-only processing pipeline
Description:
We need to create a processing pipeline for Pavlovian Conditioning data. This is actually two separate things:
1) a pipeline to process legacy (pre-Harp) data, which used software timestamps
2) a pipeline to process current data, which uses Harp timestamps.
In both cases, this is separate from the fiber processing pipeline. The fiber data should be processed with the fiber-specific pipeline
Priority: Critical (Must Complete)
Success Criteria:
- [ ] All existing Pav data is processed and NWBs are created
- [ ] Pipeline exists for processing current and future Pav data (NWBs exist)
- [ ] Pipeline contains QC
- [ ] The fiber data can be processed independent of the behavior data using existing fiber pipeline
Related Issues:
[Project Planning](https://alleninstitute.sharepoint.com/:w:/s/NeuralDynamics/EewRqUqV-oRAuXcRfO5m5dYB3daX-B2mIKRHDkW7TRaZXg?e=S3evNf)
[Original ticket](https://github.com/orgs/AllenNeuralDynamics/projects/75/views/1?filterQuery=pavlovian&pane=issue&itemId=119548626&issue=AllenNeuralDynamics%7Caind-physio-arch%7C772)
